text: Ara tini'i asamanasamuha o yaminake chaya dine srsti karena, ara tamra ‘ar‌sa chila panira upara [1], tomadera madhye ke amale srestha [2] ta pariksa karara jan'ya [3]. Ara apani yadi balena, ‘niscaya mrtyura para tomaderake ut'thita kara habe’, tabe kapherara abasya'i balabe, ‘e to suspasta jadu [4].’
